spec.description: CheckpointSpec defines the metadata around the Hive objects state in the namespace at the time of the last backup.

lastBackupChecksum.description: LastBackupChecksum is the checksum of all Hive objects in the namespace at the time of the last backup.

lastBackupRef.description: LastBackupRef is a reference to last backup object created

lastBackupTime.description: LastBackupTime is the last time we performed a backup of the namespace

status.description: CheckpointStatus defines the observed state of Checkpoint

exampleYAML:
apiVersion: hive.openshift.io/v1
kind: Checkpoint
metadata:
  name: example-checkpoint
  namespace: default
spec:
  lastBackupChecksum: "example-lastBackupChecksum"
  lastBackupRef: {}
  lastBackupTime: "example-lastBackupTime"
